Parma.WVIZ: WVIZ, virtual channel 25 (UHF digital channel 26), is a Public Broadcasting Service (PBS) member television station located in Cleveland, Ohio, United States. The station is owned by Ideastream, and is sister to NPR member radio station WCPN (90.3 FM). The two stations share studio facilities at the Idea Center on Playhouse Square in downtown Cleveland; WVIZ's transmitter is located in suburban Parma, Ohio.
